1.text: Today is a fresh start. Take a deep breath and begin again.

2.text: Healing takes time. Be gentle with yourself along the way.

3.text: You deserve kindness from yourself as much as from others.

4.text: It’s okay to ask for help when the weight feels too heavy.

5.text: Progress is progress, no matter how small.

6.text: Your feelings are valid. You don’t need to justify them.

7.text: Resting is not quitting; it’s preparing to continue.

8.text: Hope is the quiet strength that keeps you going.

9.text: Growth often starts in uncomfortable places.

10.text: Taking care of your mind is just as important as taking care of your body.

11.text: Courage is not the absence of fear, but moving forward despite it.

12.text: You are not a burden. You are a person in need of support.

13.text: It’s okay to pause and catch your breath.

14.text: Vulnerability is a form of strength.

15.text: Even the smallest acts of self-care matter.

16.text: Healing is not linear. Some days will be harder than others.

17.text: Kindness starts with how you speak to yourself.

18.text: You are worthy of love and respect, just as you are.

19.text: Moments of struggle do not erase your progress.

20.text: Taking time for yourself is not selfish—it’s necessary.

21.text: Each day offers a new opportunity to care for your mental health.

22.text: You can’t pour from an empty cup. Rest and refill.

23.text: Your story is still being written.

24.text: Strength can mean knowing when to slow down.

25.text: Self-compassion is a skill you can practice every day.

27.text: Connection is healing. Reach out when you need to.

28.text: Perfection is not the goal. Authenticity is.

29.text: You are allowed to change your mind and your path.

30.text: The way you speak to yourself matters more than you think.

31.text: Healing requires patience. Give yourself time.

32.text: Some days, surviving is enough. And that’s okay.

34.text: You are more than your struggles.

35.text: It’s okay to prioritize your mental health.

36.text: Peace begins with a single breath.

38.text: Your needs are valid, even if they’re different from others'.

39.text: Sometimes the bravest thing is to keep going.

41.text: It’s okay to set boundaries to protect your peace.

42.text: Your mental health is just as important as your physical health.

43.text: You are doing the best you can with what you have.

44.text: Not every day will feel good, but every day has moments of light.

45.text: You can be both a work in progress and worthy right now.

46.text: Taking care of yourself is a radical act of love.

47.text: Letting go of what you can’t control brings freedom.

48.text: Your worth is not measured by productivity.

49.text: Ask for support when you need it—that’s courage, not weakness.

50.text: You are not alone, even when it feels like it.

52.text: The hardest days are not permanent.

59.text: It’s okay to let go of things that no longer serve you.

66.text: Every step forward, no matter how small, is progress.

67.text: Give yourself the same grace you give to others.

68.text: You don’t have to be perfect to be enough.
